rule.ruleDesc: Run Action to close open tasks
rule.fullDesc: Run Action to close open tasks
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runAction","actionType":2,"relationType":"","actionQueryXml":"<collection logic='and' negative='false'><query><operand><field name='current.phase' caption='Current Phase' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='neq' caption='Not Equals'/><value type='Value' caption='Value'><![CDATA[Cancelled]]></value></query><query><operand><field name='current.phase' caption='Current Phase' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='neq' caption='Not Equals'/><value type='Value' caption='Value'><![CDATA[Closure]]></value></query><query><operand><field name='parent.request' caption='Parent Request' datatype='string'/></operand><operator name='equals' caption='Equals'/><value type='CurrentRecord' caption='CurrentRecord'><field name='number' caption='Number'/></value></query></collection>","ruleset":"","action":"auto.cancel","filename":"requestTask"}
